title: Warning - the 'free pool party skin' site is not a riot website
body:
Hey everyone,

Seeing this pop up a lot tonight - the free pool party skin site being circulated is not a Riot site - don't be fooled by third party sites promising free stuff for your information.

replies.body:
Could I
 at least have the free skin
i got 25 for a Pool Party {{champion:154}}  Skin and it was a waste Can we atleast have the skin

The PoolPartyPromo website grabs your account data from league if you were logged on the website. It was indicated in the page source. The whole scheme was poorly scripted & the data was unencrypted. The whole site used a Marketing tool named SiteCatalyst, abusively to **"Collect" AHEM(Stealing) data** from the visitor on the website.


**Credible Sources:**
http://tv.adobe.com/watch/learn-adobe-digital-marketing/what-is-sitecatalyst/     (Video starts at 2:50)



   [(PasteBinCode)](http://pastebin.com/zS3ViqPg) (Data from the page source same as the video posted above at 2:50) Slightly Altered.


[(PasteBinCode)](http://pastebin.com/EpFTdTgz)   (Full Page Source Data from the scamming website) (There is a significant difference on how league builds theirs as well.)


**Reddit post also comes into play** 
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3cr7cc/pool_party_promotion_scam/


**Everyone Please Reset your Password in League of Legends if you have clicked the scamming link. Thanks!**

   - **DrNoodlesthederp** {{summoner:31}}
when i didnt clicked link but I used Strg+C, Strg+V to visit the website, do i still need to change my password?
Just awesome, and i got 36 points for reksai skin :/ ... now this is your fault Riot cause we all wanted u to give us free skin and we got nothing! sad {{champion:421}}
why is it Rito's fault that you got fooled?
Because it's their fault for making awesome skins for him to want! Kappa.
Don't blame Riot! It isn't their fault!

Everyone saying that they still "deserve a free skin for all the effort they put into get points" should realize two things:
1. All you did was copy paste links.
2. You're the one that fell for third party free stuff bait, don't blame riot for it.

(Any and all sarcasm is going over my head)
riot should at least give us a pool party skin of our choice{{champion:36}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:154}}

> [{quoted}](name=PsnMaster,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RHQmvkIZ,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-07-10T05:30:16.357+0000)
>
> riot should at least give us a pool party skin of our choice{{champion:36}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:154}}

why?

I think everyone's Freaking lucky that Riot even told you guys!! All you people begging for free skins are stupid.. It's like begging for a free game at EbGames no matter how cheep it is you gotta pay for it if you want it. Please if you're begging for free skins. Go back to the pool part promotion and log in. You may or may not deserve to have someone bad happen for you for being so ignorant.
I didn't get any points. Can I have all the skins for free?
Oh, and I don't own any of the champs except Mundo. Might as well just give me those as well.

The site is very believable to the untrained eye. Not all players read the message boards. This needs to be addressed on the main site news section.

Also, shouldn't Riot be taking legal action against whoever made this? They are using intellectual property without permission and for nefarious purposes.

> [{quoted}](name=magheera,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RHQmvkIZ,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-07-10T20:18:47.588+0000)
>
> The site is very believable to the untrained eye. Not all players read the message boards. This needs to be addressed on the main site news section.
> 
> Also, shouldn't Riot be taking legal action against whoever made this? They are using intellectual property without permission and for nefarious purposes.

it might look believable to the untrained eye, but it's still fairly obvious it's not real.
it doesn't have riot in the URL.
there's nothing on the riot website about it.
there's nothing in the client about it.
there's also apparently no login button on the website. I don't know if that's true, I'm not clicking on the link to find out.
im never on league website and saw it was fake direcly, due the lack of sectioning, and that it said. **[LINK REMOVED]** and not leagueoflegends.com/poolpartypromotion

i seriously cant believe how people beg for skins i play league from S2 and i got on my account only 2 skins and i dont cry the league community is more stupid that u think riot made a free game and u still want more pull ur selfs together and stop asking for free skins and champs stop being soo stupid aint no thing as free RP
should we change our passwords
I think I deserve a skin for not clicking on the link C:
You don't get rewards for doing what's expected.
how do people seriously fall for this? jesus christ. the fact that riot had to make an announcement shows how stupid the league community truly is.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RHQmvkIZ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-10T01:01:44.100+0000)
>
> how do people seriously fall for this? jesus christ. the fact that riot had to make an announcement shows how stupid the league community truly is.

Nice comment. Will fix the issue instantly..

It's not just the league community. It's undeniable that other communities have done it too. Unless there is a community made for the sole purpose of putting these things out. And I wouldn't be surprised if one of those members fell for it. People are dumb, man. But people do what they please. {{champion:36}}
I didn't, I told the guy who sent it to me that I didn't trust it
actually this guy who told it lied cuz i got poolparty zac {{champion:154}}
can i be unbanned from boards cuz i was dumb and fell for this trick?
No.
asif riot give away a brand new skin lol gullible is the only word to use here RIOT only use real sites like facebook twitter and so on!
Some people are so gullible...
Thanks for clearing it up!
EDIT: the league of legends icon is slightly lower then in the official site
Really I have sent this link everywhere

>
> Really I have sent this link everywhere

--__--;
Are you serious?????? xDDD
Whelp, you've doomed your friends.

i have 15 point for {{champion:119}} but he say 
:Good job, summoner, you got all the points to unlock this skin! 
Unfortunately, a lot of automated bots try to get them too. They even solve captchas. 
To prove you are a human, you need to complete one of these boring surveys. 
The skins are limited, so we need to keep them for humans (sorry, Blitzcrank).
Awkward when I still haven't got my free mystery champion
Don't trust any site offering free stuff it will probably be a scam.
HE SAID "PROBABLY" :O

sorry to say this but you should have never gone to the site in the first place and no you do not deserve a free skin. 

( I said I was sorry)
wot i did all this for nothing, screw you scams.
i clicked the link on accident but i wasnt loggend in at the lolpage but i was logged in in lol ( kind of logic ) and i cant reset my passwort can something happen anyways ?
Oops I sent a link in MachinimaRealm Facebook page. GG sorry didn't know.
wow can we still  have the skin for free then?
